name: Higher or Lower
description:
Totally addictive classic card game, how far can you go?

WHAT IS HIGHER OR LOWER?
Higher or Lower is a classic card game for all your iOS devices. Simply guess whether the next card is higher or lower and see how far you can get. You have 3 lives and unlimited cards. How do you compare to the rest of the world?

FEATURES
★ Game Center integration
★ Worldwide leaderboards and achievements
★ See how you compare to your friends
★ Gorgeous retina graphics for both iPhone and iPad

COMING SOON
☆ More languages

Any comments, problems or feature requests tweet us at http://twitter.com/tapboxltd
